aircraft.value: Hornet Strike - AC-5055-141 at Maintenance Hub-Y

defect_observed.value: Pressure regulator drift. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective De-icing System component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock

preventive_action.value: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 08/08/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 09/08/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 10/08/2024 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 11/08/2024 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 13/08/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai
